Title: 37133 - # Seasonal DIY Projects
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 different seasonal DIY projects. Talk about projects that would help someone transition from season to season, focusing on DIY décor. You can discuss things like front door wreaths for each season, or hand sewn place mats to represent the current time of year. Write for an audience that is interested in DIY, crafting and style. You can place your target URL by using these mail box projects as a year round DIY suggestion. You can explain to your readers that a fun project like this can keep being updated as each season changes.

Title: 37134 - # DIY Projects Moms Will Love
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 DIY projects that moms would enjoy. You can discuss a wide range of projects from décor, to minor home renovations, seasonal projects, and simple crafts. Use the resource links for a ton of options. Your target audience is moms who are interested in DIY and crafting. You can place your target URL by mentioning these DIY mailboxes as a fun project.
